column1: Local Foods////Local foods is like heaven for people who want to feel like they're eating healthy food
column2: and for the most part it is very healthy
column3: though the portions can be way bigger than you think! Every ingredient they use is just so fresh
column4: you can't go wrong. There's limited outside seating and it's overlooking a side street
column5: but still a nice treat if you're there on a day when the weather is actually nice in Houston. The whole place is very casual. The parking lot in front is almost always packed full so try a side street of you're trying to come here during lunch on a weekend for instance.
